hero.name: Venkata Rao Gonugunta
hero.title: AWS Java Developer
hero.valueProp: Skilled in building, deploying, and scaling cloud-native applications using Java, Spring Boot, and AWS services.

bioParas: I am a cloud and backend engineer with 6+ years of experience building scalable, secure applications across finance and e-commerce domains. I specialize in delivering high-performance systems that handle large-scale transactions with reliability and low latency.

My expertise centers on Java, Spring Boot, microservices, and REST API development, with strong hands-on experience in AWS services such as EC2, S3, RDS, DynamoDB, and IAM. I have built event-driven architectures using Kafka and optimized backend performance for production systems.

I focus on automation and DevOps best practices, implementing CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins, Docker, and Kubernetes to improve deployment speed and stability. I collaborate effectively in Agile teams to deliver secure, cloud-native solutions with measurable business impact.

I am passionate about clean architecture, performance tuning, and continuous learning, ensuring systems remain scalable, maintainable, and future-ready. I consistently apply best practices in security, testing, and observability to deliver enterprise-grade solutions.
highlights: Improved financial transaction processing efficiency by 30% by architecting and deploying cloud-native microservices on AWS.
Reduced unauthorized access incidents by 40% through secure authentication and authorization using Spring Security, JWT, and AWS IAM.
Cut deployment and release cycles by up to 50% by automating CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins, Docker, and Kubernetes.
Enhanced system performance and reliability by optimizing database access and persistence layers, reducing query latency and transaction failures by up to 30%.

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
impact: Increased conversion rates by 35% through UX optimization
Reduced page load times by 60% with React performance tuning

experience.description: Built secure, scalable cloud-native financial applications using Java, Spring Boot microservices, and AWS to support high-volume transactions.
achievements: Increased financial transaction processing efficiency by 30% through a microservices-based Java and Spring Boot architecture.
Reduced unauthorized access incidents by 40% by implementing Spring Security, JWT authentication, and AWS IAM policies.
Decreased deployment time by 50% by automating CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins, Docker, and Kubernetes (EKS).
Delivered highly available, low-latency REST APIs for account management, loan processing, and fund transfers.

experience.description: Developed and scaled an e-commerce order management system using Java and Spring technologies, supporting high-volume transactions on AWS.
achievements: Built an end-to-end order management platform handling products, orders, payments, and customers with stable performance at scale.
Improved application maintainability and request handling efficiency by transitioning from Servlets/JSP to Spring MVC architecture.
Reduced database query execution time by 30% by migrating from JDBC-based access to Hibernate ORM.
Lowered manual deployment effort by 45% by automating build and deployment workflows using Jenkins and Docker on AWS.

experience.description: Built and optimized a high-throughput banking transaction processing system using Java, Spring, and AWS for reliable financial operations.
achievements: Designed a reliable banking transaction platform processing high-volume monthly transactions with strong data consistency.
Improved system throughput and reduced transaction latency by implementing multithreaded backend components in Java and Spring MVC.
Reduced transaction failure rates by 25% through Hibernate ORM optimization, inheritance mapping, and Oracle database tuning.
Increased release efficiency by 40% by streamlining CI/CD pipelines and AWS deployments using Jenkins and Docker.

contact.description: I'm always excited to discuss new opportunities, interesting projects, or just chat about technology. Feel free to reach out!
